ComicInfo.Title: An Exploitation Of Everything Dear Part Six: Death; There's Always A First Time For Everthing Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
An Exploitation Of Everything Dear Part Six: Death: As Melissa gives birth and Sabre lies bleeding, Willoughby is the only person who has a chance to stop Joyful.
There's Always A First Time For Everthing Part 2: Melissa and Adam escape from the Genelab of Tampa-Tech.
